markdownRemark.html:
Applications will soon open. You can apply to participate via the ICTP website.

Applicants are invited to submit a one-page abstract

Apply for a contributed talk!

In addition to the invited speakers, we would like to open a call for abstracts to augment and enrich the discussion.

The authors of selected abstracts will be invited to give a brief talk of about 20 minutes during the conference, followed by a discussion.

The submitted abstract for the CFA must contain:

  • name of the candidate and the institution to which they belong
  • title and subtitle of the paper
  • 350-word abstract (including spaces)

The abstract can be submitted via the application portal on the ICTP site given above.

Youth in high dimensions

Note that our workshop will be followed by Youth in high dimensions, a workshop on recent progress in the theory of machine learning, high-dimensional statistics, and inference; for logistic reasons, all applications will be administered through the same ICTP site.
